FuncDef: This command configures efm-oam operational transition dampening timers which reduce the number of efm-oam state transitions reported to upper layers.

ParaDef.Info: Indicates the number of seconds that the efm-oam protocol will wait before going back to the operational state after leaving the operational state. Note that the hold-time does not apply if efm-oam moved from operational to link-fault. Values-0 to 50. ParamDefault: Default- 0
